title: We're Halfway Through Another Intense Year For Teachers
description:
We're halfway through another intense pandemic school year. As many teachers are taking a well-deserved holiday break, we'll hear why these past few months in the classroom have gotten harder – and what that could mean for students and parents.

In participating regions, you'll also hear a local news segment that will help you make sense of what's going on in your community.

Email us at considerthis@npr.org.
copyright: Copyright 2020-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: We're Halfway Through Another Intense Year For Teachers
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Teachers share their experiences leading classes throughout the pandemic. Some say it was their worst year yet.
itunes:subtitle: Teachers share their experiences leading classes throughout the pandemic. Some say it was their worst year yet.
